movie.title: I Surrender Dear
movie.description_intro: A girl, in love with the radio voice of Bing Crosby, is kissed by him in mistake for his sister; she won't believe it's him, and in a slapstick search through hotel corridors for his new flame, Bing runs afoul of a married woman with jealous husband.
movie.description_full: A girl, in love with the radio voice of Bing Crosby, is kissed by him in mistake for his sister; she won't believe it's him, and in a slapstick search through hotel corridors for his new flame, Bing runs afoul of a married woman with jealous husband.

movies.title: Sex After Kids
movies.summary: A disparate variety of couples from all walks of life strive to maintain active sex lives despite the notable distraction of having kids.
movies.description_full: A disparate variety of couples from all walks of life strive to maintain active sex lives despite the notable distraction of having kids.
movies.synopsis: A disparate variety of couples from all walks of life strive to maintain active sex lives despite the notable distraction of having kids.

movies.title: Rhinoceros
movies.summary: Originally an absurdist play by Eugene Ionesco, Rhinoceros tells the story of a French town plagued by rhinoceroses. These are not ordinary rhinoceroses, but people who have been victims of "rhinoceritis." Or is it something else entirely? But, why are they turning into rhinoceroses and what is Ionesco trying to tell us about society?
movies.description_full: Originally an absurdist play by Eugene Ionesco, Rhinoceros tells the story of a French town plagued by rhinoceroses. But, why are they turning into rhinoceroses and what is Ionesco trying to tell us about society?

movies.title: Zombeavers
movies.summary: ZOMBEAVERS is an action-packed horror/comedy in which a group of college kids staying at a riverside cabin are menaced by a swarm of deadly zombie beavers. A weekend of sex and debauchery soon turns gruesome as the beavers close in on the kids. Riding the line between scary, sexy and funny, the kids are soon fighting for their lives in a desperate attempt to fend off the hoard of beavers that attack them in and around their cabin.

movies.title: Batman and Harley Quinn
movies.summary: Batman and Nightwing are forced to team with the Joker's sometimes-girlfriend Harley Quinn to stop a global threat brought about by Poison Ivy and Jason Woodrue, the Floronic Man.
